select d.NAME depname,os.NAME staffname , from f LEFT JOIN MDM_WC_STATION s ON f.WorkstationID=s.WC_STATION_ID LEFT JOIN OA_STAFF os ON f.PersonId=os.STAFF_ID LEFT JOIN OA_DEPARTMENT d ON os.DEPARTMENT_ID=d.DEPARTMENT_ID where 1=1

and ( f.PersonId = #{PersonId} )
